S:log-item.D:comment:
Fix to DERBY-704, submitted by Knut Anders Hatlen
From Knut:
<quote> The patch modifies the search for a free slot in the page cache (org.apache.derby.impl.services.cache.Clock.findFreeItem()) in the following way:
1) find out how many invalid pages there are in the page cache 2) check whether pages that are skipped in the search are invalid 3) if the number of skipped invalid pages equals the number of invalid pages, stop the search for invalid pages </quote>
